programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie prepares to defend Hilltop and the people of Riverbend against Hornsby; Hornsby hires Leah to kill Maggie.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and Negan rush to the Commonwealth to stop Hornsby from going after their families; Pamela deals with protestors demanding justice for Sebastian's crimes; Mercer needs Rosita's help to fight a swarm.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol makes a deal with Pamela to wipe the slate clean on behalf of her friends; Aaron, Jerry, Lydia and Elijah get on the road to Oceanside to fill them in on a plan; the Commonwealth celebrates Founders Day.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Eugene goes on the run after the Founders Day incident; Pamela tasks Mercer to investigate his whereabouts, to Max and Princess' dismay; Aaron, Jerry, Lydia and Elijah encounter an unusual complication at an abandoned Renaissance Faire.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and Carol investigate the whereabouts of their friends after Pamela disappears them from the Commonwealth; Pamela asks Yumiko to prosecute Eugene on behalf of the Commonwealth.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Separated from their children, Maggie, Gabriel and Rosita track a military convoy to a mysterious destination; Ezekiel, Kelly, Negan and Annie find themselves at a work site; Daryl and Carol follow a train that has taken Connie aboard.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Ezekiel and Negan team up to lead a clandestine labor revolt against the warden; Aaron, Jerry, Lydia and Elijah catch up with Luke and Jules fleeing Oceanside; Eugene stands trial with Yumiko as his defense attorney.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Alexandrians and the prisoners head back to the Commonwealth to confront Pamela Milton; a swarm approaches the city.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and Carol rush Judith to the hospital; Rosita, Eugene and Gabriel search for Coco; Maggie and Negan take arms against Pamela; as the citizens of the Commonwealth deal with the herd, the heroes assemble for one last stand to save their future.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick searches for his family after emerging from a coma; Morgan and Duane help teach Rick the new rules for survival.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick unknowingly causes a group of survivors to be trapped by walkers; Rick must confront an enemy more dangerous than the undead.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick goes back to Atlanta to save a man's life; Lori and Shane deal with the surprise return of someone they thought was dead.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Another group of survivors threatens Rick, Daryl, T-Dog and Glenn, sending Rick's mission to Atlanta awry; Jim becomes unhinged back at camp.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick leads the group to the CDC hoping to cure an infected Jim, who must make a terrible life-and-death decision.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the group are allowed into the CDC by a strange doctor; all is not what it seems in their newfound haven.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick leads the group out of Atlanta; the group is stopped by a threat unlike anything anyone has seen before; the search for someone who has gone missing.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick discovers a possible safe haven; Shane must go on a dangerous mission to get needed medical supplies.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The group awaits Shane's return; Shane finds himself trapped in a school; Daryl and Andrea search for someone in the woods.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Shane makes a deadly sacrifice that inspires unusual behavior and self-distancing; the rest of the group struggles to find the balance between living to die and dying to live.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the other survivors continue searching for Sophia; Hershel disagrees with the group's plan and tells them they are only welcome at the farm temporarily.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Glenn knows too much for his comfort level; Daryl finds a sign of life and tries to make it back to the farm alive.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Secrets are told and revealed; Hershel refuses to acknowledge the world's new reality; Andrea comes out of her shell; everything is food for something.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the others try to restore order after a terrible discovery; Hershel takes up an old habit and disappears.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Enemies trap Rick, Hershel and Glenn, who fight to survive; when everyone realizes she is missing, Shane goes after Lori and finds her in danger.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and Shane are in conflict over the fate of an outsider; Andrea helps Hershel's daughter face a crucial decision.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick sides with Shane causing Dale to worry that the group is losing its humanity; Carl's actions have unintended consequences.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: When the group learns that someone dangerous may be loose near the farm, Rick, Shane, Daryl and Glenn try to keep everyone safe; Shane's antagonism grows and Carl faces the consequences of his actions.
